ITEM.NAME: EMBEDDED
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR301') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR310')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: NAMENODE_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_JDBC_URL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_CLASSNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: METASTORE_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KEYTAB=='true') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: KEYTAB_PATH
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KEYTAB=='true') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5'))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false' AND SET_MAPRED_JT=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5')))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5'))) AND (SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5')))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5'))) AND (SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the server.

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5')))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPREDUCE_MAP_MEMORY_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (SET_MEMORY == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5')))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPREDUCE_REDUCE_MEMORY_MB

PARAMETER.NAME: YARN_APP_MAPREDUCE_AM_RESOURCE_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (#LINK@CONNECTOR.OUT.TABLE_REF == '0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (SET_MEMORY == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5')))
